Key:
Okay, so we're at the station... What should we do
now?
Did you not have anything in mind, Papa?

Well I thought there'd be more stuff to look at versus
from the shopping district. Maybe we can walk
around...
Hey, isn't that Shido-kun? Are you on a date without\nYoshino? Is this some kind of date?
(That voice...)
Shido-san... What a coincidence.

Yoshino and Yoshinon! What a coincidence. I'm
surprised to see you two here at the station. What's
the matter?
Well, um...
Sorry Yoshino. It was crowded.

What? Shido?!
What are you doing here?
Oh, um...

Papa, that's Yoshino-chan and Kotori-chan right?
Are we playing together?
Sh-Shido-san... That child...
Did you... abduct her?!

Aw, maaan. You finally did it, didn't ya Shido-kun...\nWeren't you satisfied with Yoshino-chan and Kotori-\nchan?	
Message	Shido	Who the hell do you guys think I am...	
Message	Kotori	I mean, it's Shido...	
Message	Yoshinon	It is Shido-kun..."
Yes...
How little faith do you guys have in me?!

Papa, they have faith in you. Everyone's saying the
same things about you.
Yeah, but it's in the wrong direction!

So, who is she? You're making her call you Papa...
Are you sure you didn't kidnap her?
Of course not! She's, um...
Rio is Tonomachi-kun's relative.
Huh?
What... Is that true?!
Wow...
What a surprise!
Right, Papa?

Yeah. The teacher needed to speak with Tonomachi
after class, so I'm with her until that's done.

I see. Seriously, you're surrounded by all kinds of
girls, Shido.
Hmmm. Anyways, Shido-kun. Yoshino says she's\nwondering about something.
Yoshino? What is it?
Why is that girl calling you... Papa?
O-Oh about that...

Papa is like my Papa, so he's Papa. Anyone like Papa
I can call papa.
Oh... Is that so?
Haha... I guess so.
Papa, eh? You look so happy about that... Pathetic.
Hey... There's probably a better way to express that.

It's fine. It's just you, Shido. Anyways, what's her
name?
Rio is Rio! Nice to see you, Kotori-chan.

Yes, nice to see you too. I was going to introduce
myself... but it seems like you already know me.
Yeah, I guess Tonomachi talks about us a lot.

What? That's amazing. You just listen to him, and you
can figure things out.

That's true. I mean, it must be her first time seeing
you guys.
Hey, Yoshino-chan. This rabbit is cute.
Um... Rio-san... She isn't a rabbit...
That's right! Yoshinon has... an awesome name. Yoshinon!
Hmm... Yoshinon?
Yup, yup! Yoshinon! You can also add a '-san' too?
Yoshinon Rabbit-san!
LIKE I SAID... Yohinon isn't a rabbit!
That's... right. Yoshinon is Yoshinon!

Mm... Rio sees now. Yoshino and Yoshinon... So
confusing.
Aw...
Nooo!

Jeez, what are you two doing? You're dealing with a
kid, remember? Well, I guess there's not much
difference there.
You're one to talk, no?
Shut up. Anyways, Shido, what are you guys up to?

Well, Rio said she's going to go back in the evening,
so we were taking a stroll to kill time. We didn't
have any particular plans.
All right, then it's settled. Rio!
Hm? You called me?
Let's play together.
No problem, right Shido?
S-Sure. But are you sure you guys are okay with that?

Absolutely. Yoshino and I were planning to anyways.
What do you say, Rio?
Okay! Rio wants to play, too!

U-Um... You know, you should call me Kotori-oneesan
like the elegant girl I am. Or you can call me Onee-
sama.
Okay. Let's go, Kotori-chan.
She's not listening... *whimper*...
Oh well, let's go.
All right. Yoshino is going to teach you what it\nmeans to be the master of hanging out!
Y-Yoshinon... Don't say weird stuff.

(And so we all hung out together. I guess this turned
out okay.)

(We had some parfait at a restaurant, then we went
to a shop to check out some trinkets, and before we
knew it, it was evening already.)
Rio has to go soon.
Oh, is it time to see Marina?
Yeah. I promised her.
I see. Did you have fun?
Yes. I had a lot of fun.
Okay, good.

Well... Bye Papa, Kotori-chan, Yoshino-chan, and
Yoshinon Rabbit-san!
Like I said, it's not Rabbit-san! Oh well, whatever...\nBye-bye!
That was fun. Goodbye... Rio-san.
Bye, Rio.
Later, Rio.
Okay! Bye, everyone!

(...Hey wait. I had something to ask Marina and I totally
forgot. Oh well, next time I see her―)
I forgot to tell you something, Papa.
Hm? What is it?
If you're going to visit today... Park, okay?
(Rio whispered into my ear.)
...Okay.
Bye-bye!
Hey, Shido-kun. What did Rio-chan just say?

...She wants to play with everyone again. I guess she
was just shy.
(I couldn't tell her what Rio told me.)

Well if she's related to Shido's friend, I guess we
can see each other again if we want to.
Hey Kotori, Tonomachi isn't my friend.
(That was a messed up thing to say.)
Shido... You're a terrible friend.
(I ignored her and we headed home.)
